languages.text: "Мы все повинны в грехе терпимости. Надеюсь, что смерть ее хоть немного облегчит бремя на наших душах".
"We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."
languages.original_text: "Мы все повинны в грехе терпимости. Надеюсь, что смерть ее хоть немного облегчит бремя на наших душах".

traits.locale_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我们都犯下了宽容之罪。我希望她的死能减轻我们灵魂的负担，哪怕只有一点点也好。”
languages.original_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."

traits.locale_text: “我们都犯下了宽容之罪。我希望她的死能减轻我们灵魂的负担，哪怕只有一点点也好。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous avons tous déjà succombé à l'appel de la tolérance. J'espère que sa mort permettra de soulager nos âmes, ne serait-ce qu'un peu. »
languages.original_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons tous déjà succombé à l'appel de la tolérance. J'espère que sa mort permettra de soulager nos âmes, ne serait-ce qu'un peu. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Todos hemos cometido el pecado de la tolerancia. Espero que su muerte aligere la carga sobre nuestras almas, aunque solo sea un poco».
languages.original_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."

traits.locale_text: «Todos hemos cometido el pecado de la tolerancia. Espero que su muerte aligere la carga sobre nuestras almas, aunque solo sea un poco».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私たちはみな邪悪に寛容だった。奴が死んだことで私たちの魂の負担が、ごくわずかでも軽くなるといいのだが」
languages.original_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはみな邪悪に寛容だった。奴が死んだことで私たちの魂の負担が、ごくわずかでも軽くなるといいのだが」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wir alle haben die böse Sünde der Toleranz begangen. Ich hoffe, ihr Tod wird die Last von unserer Seele nehmen, zumindest ein klein wenig."
languages.original_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."

traits.locale_text: "Wir alle haben die böse Sünde der Toleranz begangen. Ich hoffe, ihr Tod wird die Last von unserer Seele nehmen, zumindest ein klein wenig."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."

languages.text: "Hepimiz tahammül gösterme suçunu işledik. Umarım Theodora'nın ölümü, ruhlarımızdaki ağırlığı biraz da olsa hafifletir."
languages.original_text: "We have all perpetrated the evil of tolerance. I hope her death will lighten the burden on our souls, if only a little."

traits.locale_text: "Hepimiz tahammül gösterme suçunu işledik. Umarım onun ölümü, ruhlarımızdaki ağırlığı biraz da olsa hafifletir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
